overview: Remember what it was like back in the days before every girl thought she had to have her cooch waxed? Are you tired of the razor burn and stubble? Well if you think it's only the ugly, old, foreign girls who don't shave, think again, because these bushy beauties are cute enough to win the hearts of even the die-hard bald beaver lovers. There's nothing like the taste, feel, and smell of a cute girl with moist short and curlys. You'll want to start a worldwide ban on razors too once you've seen all of these inviting hairy holes!
title: ATK Natural & Hairy 6
